item.title: New push would cap credit card interest rates at 10%: Here's what we know
item.description: President Donald Trump called for a 10% cap on credit card interest rates starting Jan. 20. Here's what we know.

item.title: Credit card transfer bonuses (January): 15% bonus to Avianca LifeMiles
item.description: Here's a look at all the current transfer bonuses involving major credit cards and airline and hotel loyalty programs.

item.title: Booming Austin airport set to nearly double in size with 2 new concourses
item.description: The booming Austin airport will invest more than $5 billion to nearly double in size with 32 new gates.

item.title: Reports: EVA Air to launch Washington, DC's first-ever nonstop flight to Taiwan
item.description: EVA Air will connect Washington, D.C. with Taipei beginning in July.

item.title: Hilton announces the locations of premium club lounges accessible to Diamond Reserve members
item.description: Hilton launched a website with its premium club locations that Diamond Reserve members, as well as travelers in eligible rooms or suites, can access.
